alert.note: Alert for Coffey; Lyon; Osage (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 17 at 5:00PM CDT until September 17 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN OSAGE...NORTHWESTERN COFFEY AND EAST CENTRAL LYON COUNTIES... At 459 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lebo, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. This storm has a history of producing damaging winds and large hail. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lebo, Hartford and Beto Junction. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 143 and 158. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
